cardTypes.name: Basic
cardTypes.description: A card tagged as Basic for rules and synergies that reference Basic cards.

cardTypes.name: Technique
cardTypes.description: A non-basic, non-ultimate card from a character's kit (the three non-basic cards in the starting five).

cardTypes.name: Ultimate
cardTypes.description: A card that costs Ultimate Meter to play and can be referenced by rules that care about Ultimate cards.

cardTypes.name: Attack
cardTypes.description: A card that deals damage using Power or directly contributes to dealing damage.

cardTypes.name: Defense
cardTypes.description: A card focused on protection or mitigation (example: granting Power Shield).

cardTypes.name: Special
cardTypes.description: A card other than an attack or defense (example: granting a buff or debuff). Special cards have Power: - and never roll Power unless stated otherwise.

cardTypes.name: Physical
cardTypes.description: Indicates the card's damage is physical (and can be referenced by rules that care about physical damage).

cardTypes.name: Magical
cardTypes.description: Indicates the card's damage is magical (and can be referenced by rules that care about magical damage).

cardTypes.name: Mental
cardTypes.description: Indicates the card's damage is mental (and can be referenced by rules that care about mental damage).

cardTypes.name: Electric
cardTypes.description: Indicates the card's damage is electric (and can be referenced by rules that care about electric damage).

cardTypes.name: Melee
cardTypes.description: Indicates the card is used at melee range (and can be referenced by rules that care about melee range).

cardTypes.name: Ranged
cardTypes.description: Indicates the card is used at ranged distance (and can be referenced by rules that care about ranged distance).

cardTypes.name: AoE
cardTypes.description: Area of Effect. A card that affects all characters in the targeted area (example: all enemies).

cardTypes.name: Splash
cardTypes.description: A card that affects the main target and its adjacent neighbors.

cardTypes.name: Bounce
cardTypes.description: A card that affects the main target and a random adjacent character. Use Bounce X to repeat the random adjacent effect.

cardTypes.name: Slash
cardTypes.description: An attack subtype used for rules and synergies that care about slash attacks.

cardTypes.name: Pierce
cardTypes.description: An attack subtype used for rules and synergies that care about pierce attacks.

cardTypes.name: Blunt
cardTypes.description: An attack subtype used for rules and synergies that care about blunt attacks.

cardTypes.name: Multihit
cardTypes.description: An attack that hits multiple times. The multihit count equals the number of hits the card would deal on this use (example: "deal damage 3 times" means count 3; "deal damage X times" means count X after X is set). If it loses a clash with another Attack, reduce the multihit count by 1 and Reuse it instead of discarding it. If it reaches 0, treat it as a normal Attack card. If a card references remaining multihit count, use the current count after any reductions.

cardTypes.name: Transformation
cardTypes.description: A card that changes the character's form or mode, usually by applying or consuming a transformation status effect.

cardTypes.name: Recovery
cardTypes.description: A card that restores resources (example: healing HP).

cardTypes.name: Buff
cardTypes.description: A card that applies positive effects, status effects, or other benefits to allies.

cardTypes.name: Debuff
cardTypes.description: A card that applies negative effects, status effects, or other hindrances to enemies.
